description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The ultimate game of deception, quick reflexes and luck is here: ButtonHoldingExtravaganzaParty! This multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players will test your skills at deceiving your friends and holding buttons.
